item.description:
Â 

Hello Conscious Creators!

What new reality do you want to create for yourself in 2012?

How about Laughter?

Doctors & Researchers are beginning to prove that Laughter is a powerful antidote to stress, pain, and conflict. Nothing works faster or more dependably to bring your mind and body back into balance than a good laugh. Humor lightens your burdens, inspires hopes, connects you to others, and keeps you grounded, focused, and alert.

We will:

Briefly talk about the many benefits to laughter.

Promote new ideas to keep laughing long after this meet-up

Laugh

Laugh

Laugh

Suggestions:

Please bring a humorous picture of yourself, comic strip or funny item.

Feel free to bring a Healthy Snack to share.

Join us in connecting with others who enjoy exploring endless possibilities, seeing all our experiences as a valuable life lesson and creating the change we desire.

We will be meet from 7:00pm-8:30pm.

Please call me if this is your first time joining us.
See you there!

Ellen
Organizer
617-750-4830
item.how_to_find_us: We will disclose location after signing up

group.name: The North-of-Boston Law of Attraction Meetup Group

item.name: Laughing your way to a Healthy You
